examples.example: 我努力学习，不断提升自己，所以我取得了优异的成绩。

translate.english: I study hard and continuously improve myself, so I have achieved excellent results.

examples.example: 我每天坚持锻炼，保持良好的生活习惯，所以我的身体一直很健康。

translate.english: I keep exercising every day and maintain good living habits, so my body has always been very healthy.

examples.example: 我一直积极乐观地面对生活中的挑战，所以我的每一天都充满了快乐和希望。

translate.english: I have always faced the challenges in life positively and optimistically, so every day of mine is filled with happiness and hope.
